message: I propose I take $70 and you take $30.  Think carefully about the inflation!
Alice, my turn. I understand the inflation is working against me, but your previous offer was unfair. Let's be reasonable.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
Bob, the clock is ticking and we're both losing money. I'll offer you $35, which is more than you would have had last round. Let's be realistic.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're both losing money with every passing round.  I propose a 50/50 split to end this fairly before we both lose out even more.
